items.storedetaileddescription:
These microfiber towels are designed specifically for cleaning windows. Featuring an extra tight weave in a mini ribbed pattern, these towels leave no lint or streaks behind.

Color may vary depending on production run: Green or Blue. The quality of the towel is the same, color variation is the only difference.
items.outofstockmessage: This item is currently out of stock, please select R1411
items.storedescription: The Original Microfiber Glass Towel! These smooth (with a slight ridged pattern), low pile microfiber towels are great for windows, mirror and chrome. They are completely lint and streak free! The towels in this auto microfiber towel set are finished with a heavy duty continuous stitch edge to prevent fraying, and to extend their life. We suggest using one damp towel and one dry towel. Fold the car window cleaning towels twice to make an 8"x8" square that fits perfectly in your hands. Wipe the glass with the damp towel to remove any dirt/grime and follow up with the dry towel to remove any moisture and residual streaking. When the towel section becomes soiled flip the towel to a new clean side, so that you are always using a clean towel section.
